title: Create a spreadsheet of leads: companies hiring welders in USA
snippet:
We're looking to create a spreadsheet of leads: 4,000 different companies that are posting jobs looking for welders. We will be targeting top US cities, and the process is very simple:


For every city on this list [1], search for "welder" on the following job sites: 

- http://www.indeed.com/
- https://www.monster.com/
- http://www.jobs.com/ 


Then for every job with a unique employer (important - no duplicates!) put down the name of the company, the e-mail contact address, and the link to the job. The attached example spreadsheet has a few examples. Often you will have to do a quick google search  of the company to get their email, if it isn't in the job posting.


Note: we have a list of top 100 most populated cities to go off that we'll be using: 

[1] - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_United_States_cities_by_population 


The ideal distribution of leads looks like this: 

- 100 leads from each of the top 10 cities 
- 50 leads from cities ranked 10 - 50 
- 25 leads from remaining cities until we hit 4,000 leads


Notes: 

- If you run out of leads from a city, just move on to the next. 
- Most leads require a quick google search of the company name to find their website and email. Please make sure you get the right company when googling (e.g. do "[company name] [city]")
- ONLY include leads where you can find an e-mail address! 


TIMELINE:


We are looking to collect the 4K leads within 1 week of starting the contract.


BONUSES: 


After the first 4,000 leads are collected, we will be willing to extend the contract, and pay additional $50 per each extra 1,000 leads.
